tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    report_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    demographic_data JSONB,
    market_trends_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(50),
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_category VARCHAR(50),
  trend_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  city VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerDemographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE ReportGeneration (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  trend_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  report_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_gender VARCHAR(10),
    customer_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50),
    product_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    order_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_description VARCHAR(255)
)
